name: Touhou Fangame ~ Η Απόδραση του Πιτόγυρου
name_original: Touhou Fangame ~ Η Απόδραση του Πιτόγυρου
description:
☯ Thank you for playing one of my 東方 Fangames!
☯ This game is a joke, please don't take it seriously.
☯ Touhou Fangame #7.9 ~ The Escape of Pitogyros

███████████▌Getting Started▐████████████

➤  Move with the arrows: ◄▲▼►
➤  Shoot/Confirm with: X
➤  Focus/Cancel with: Z
➤  Use Shield with: C
➤  Pause with: SPACE BAR
➤  Return to Menu with: E

☯  Make sure your language is set to ENG! If not then
       hit Alt+Shift and change it. Scratch only reads ENG!!

██████████▌Menu in English▐███████████

Το παιχνίδι είναι στα ελληνικά but you can experience it as is without knowing greek.

➤  START
➤  MUSIC ROOM
➤  MANUAL
➤  ADVERTISEMENT
➤  CREDITS

█████████▌Purpose of the Game▐██████████

☯ This game takes place in an alternative universe 
      where everything is greek. This game will make 
      more sense if you are greek. But I know you aren't.
      Which is why the instructions are in english.

☯  The story is Yuyuko isn't giving Reimu her food so
       she has to take it form her. That's all.

☯  Αν τυχαίνει και είσαι Έλληνας τότε απλά παίξε το 
      παιχνίδι, τα εξηγεί όλα στα ελληνικά. Νομίζω.

█████████████▌Other▐██████████████

☯  Bosses & enemies do NOT have a hitbox.

☯  The "Shield" function consumes score to protect
 you from the bullets and lasers. You will HAVE to
use it at some point at least once. The more you
hold "C", the more score you are going to lose.

☯  You are going to get a grade at the end depending
on how many lives you lost so do your best!!

☯  The Touhou Project and all its components belong 
       to Team Shanghai Alice (Zun).

➤  The first download is the game in a .sb3
➤  The Second is the game in a .exe for x64 windows
